entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
